repnme.cdata!: Papua New Guinea - Second Power Project

abstracts.cdata!:
The project consists of three
            components: (a) technical assistance for ELCOM's
            in-service training program; (b) expansion of ELCOM's
            distribution network; and (c) financing of the shortfall in
            foreign exchange due to currency exchange adjustments
            affecting the Ramu project financed by loan 737-PNG.
